text:
problem when trying to port code from `RegionExtractor` to `nilearn.image.image`. Because of this "global imports" problem, I have imported internally whichever necessary. It worked.

But, I think we should fix this problem. To not to get the same problem to others. 
Discussions and ideas are welcome.

This is out of box but if anybody wants why I am doing this. please have a look at my `RegionExtractor` PR to-do list.
title: circular importing errors

text:
This would be great to fix that. This just needs a bit of thought about which direction the dependency should flow between packages/modules and probably some moving around.

Maybe something to do after the release so that we have more time to catch bugs.
